forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 47F. E winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
